description: We are a modern 360 agency whose heart is digital. Our mission is to be a partner and guide in a dynamically changing world. How are we working? In Feno we believe that digital is not a technology concept. Digital is a constant change of thinking, communication and action of people in a hyper-connected world. We are looking for trends and insights in it. We are the partner and guide of our clients. We give impetus to change.
